PROFILECONFIG_DESCRIPTION: With this command you will be able to customize your profile card in various ways
PC_INTRO:
<:_:979009081325019156> **Introduction**: Set an introductionary message on your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Favorite Character**: Select your favorite character
<:_:979009081325019156> **Favorite Series**: Select your favorite series
<:_:979009081325019156> **Display Card**: Select a card to be displayed on your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Profile Background**: Set a background for your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Font Color**: Change your profile's text color
<:_:979009081325019156> **Profile Glow**: Apply a glowing effect to your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Badges**: Display badges on your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Profile Color**: Change the base color of your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Profile Ring**: Set a ring for your avatar on your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Enable GIF**: Enable animated profile picture and selected card on your profile
RG_MENU_DESC: Reloads the GIF profile after applying the changes
UNLOCK_GIF: {{author}} Do you want to unlock GIF feature for **{{amount}}** **{{currency}}**?
MISSING_CURRENCY: {{author}} You don't have enough **{{currency}}** for this process
GIF_ENABLED: The GIF profile is already enabled
GIF_ENABLE_SUCCESSFUL: The GIF profile is now enabled. Use the `Reload GIF profile` button to make your profile animated.
ENABLE_GIF: You need to enable GIF profile to use this option
GIF_NOTE: Note: Converting your profile into GIF will remove the Glow from your profile. Are you sure you want to continue?
TYPE_FAV_CHAR: Enter the name of your favorite character
TYPE_FAV_SERIES: Enter the name of your favorite series
PROVIDE_FAV_CC: Enter the code of the card you want to display on your profile
PROVIDE_PROFILE_RING: Enter the ID of the **Profile Ring** to set it. | Type `none` to reset.
NON_TRADABLE_NOTE: Profile Backgrounds cannot be traded in any way
NEED_MIN_AWARDS: {{author}} You need a minimum of **9** badges in order to use this option
PROVIDE_ACH_ID: Badges on your profile are displayed from left to right
NO_GLOW: Enter a **Glow** code. Type `none` to remove.
SET_FC_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to set **{{character}}** from **{{series}}** as your favorite character?
SET_FS_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to set **{{series}}** as your favorite series?
CANNOT_SET_PBG: {{author}} You don't have enough **{{currency}}** to buy this **Profile Background**
GLOW_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} The **Glow** code you provided is either invalid or not in your inventory
BGCOLOR_WIST_MISSING: {{author}} You need 10 {{emoji}} to set profile color
PROVIDE_PBG_ID: {{author}} Please enter the ID of the **Profile Background** you want to buy
NON_TRADABLE_FOOTER: This process will change your current Profile Background
INTRO_TOO_LONG: {{author}} Your introduction message can only be **90** characters long
SET_INTRO_CONFIRM:
Are you sure you want to display the following text on your profile?

```fix
{{intro}}
```
SET_GLOW_CODE: Are you sure you want to apply the **{{glowName}}** **Glow** to your profile's background?
REMOVE_PROFILE_GLOW: Are you sure you want to remove the **Glow** from your profile's background?
SET_PCOLOR: Are you sure you want to set the **{{glowName}}** as your profile's color?
REMOVE_PCOLOR: Are you sure you want to reset your profile color?
SET_CARD_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to set **{{card}}** as your display card?
SET_BG_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to buy the **{{selectedbg}}** **Profile Background** for **{{amount}}** {{emoji}}?
CANNOT_FIND_ACH: {{user}} You don't have any achievements with the following IDs: {{ids}}
MAX_AWARDS_DISPLAY: {{author}} You can only display a maximum of **9** badges on your profile
SET_AWARDS_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to display the badges ({{awards}}) on your profile?
PC_CHARACTER_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any character with that name
PC_SERIES_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any series with that name
SUCCESSFUL_CHARACTER: {{author}} Successfully set **{{characterName}}** as your favorite character
SUCCESSFUL_SERIES: {{author}} Successfully set **{{seriesName}}** as your favorite series
SUCCESSFUL_DISPLAY_CARD: {{author}} Successfully set **{{characterName}}** as your display card
SUCCESSFUL_FONT_COLOR: {{author}} Successfully applied the **{{glowName}}** **Glow** to your profile's font
SUCCESSFUL_REMOVE_FCOLOR: {{author}} Successfully removed the **Glow** from your profile's font
SUCCESSFUL_REMOVE_PGLOW: {{author}} Successfully removed the **Glow** from your profile's background
SUCCESSFUL_PROFILE_COLOR: {{author}} Successfully set **{{glowName}}** as your profile's color
SUCCESSFUL_AWARDS: {{author}} Successfully placed the selected badges onto your profile
MODAL_ERROR_RESPONSE: There was an error while fetching the response. Please try again
NO_PBG_FOUND: Could not find any **Profile Background** with ID `{{id}}`
NO_PR_FOUND: Could not find **Profile Ring** with ID `{{id}}` in your inventory
PBG_EXIST_INV: You already have **Profile Background** with ID `{{id}}` in your inventory
NO_ENOUGH_AMOUNT_PBG: You don't have enough **{{currency}}** to purchase this **Profile Background**
NO_PBG_INV: Could not find **Profile Background** with ID `{{id}}` in your inventory
SELECT_PBG_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to select the **{{backgroundName}}** **Profile Background**?
SELECT_PR_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to select the **{{ringName}}** **Profile Ring**?
REMOVE_FONT_GLOW: Are you sure you want to remove the **Glow** from your profile's font?
SET_FONT_GLOW: Are you sure you want to apply the **{{glowName}}** **Glow** to your profile's font?
ANIMATED_FEATURE: {{author}} Your profile picture or selected card must be animated to use this feature
PROCESSING_GIF:
{{author}} Processing your GIF... <a:_:876610443148406794>
This may take some time, you can continue playing
GIF_SUCCESSFUL: {{author}} GIF profile was successfully generated. Use `{{prefix}}pro` to view
